thread.title: doubles down on 'impenetrable, physical' wall during immigration speech
thread.title_full: Trump doubles down on 'impenetrable, physical' wall during immigration speech | Fox News

author: WeThePeople50
text:
Illegal -- Not "UnDocumented".
Hannity and others Must Stop Allowing Juan Williams, Liberals, Hillary / Kaine from using the tactic of BLURRING THE LINE Between LEGAL and ILLEGAL IMMIGRATION.
Whenever they say the PC Term "UnDocumented", they should immediately Correct them to use the Correct term "Undocumented ? You mean Illegal Immigrants. That's what we are talking about".
Just as a Drug Dealer is Not an "undocumented pharmacist".
All Illegal Immigrants are Criminals - they broke our Immigration Law.
The DisHonest Liberal Media tries to BLUR the line between good Legal (Vetted) Immigration (Which Trump has always said he supports - HIS WIFE IS AN IMMIGRANT). 
This has gone on Way to Long.
Stop the Dishonest Progressive Democrat Word Play. 
Just as the Media Allows Hillary to make Dishonest Word Play statements like "My husband and I have never taken a penny of SALARY (WORD PLAY ALERT) from the Clinton Foundation". Well YOU DON'T NEED TO HAVE A SALARY, IF YOU USE THE FOUNDATION LIKE A SLUSH FUND THAT PAYS YOUR FLIGHTS, HOUSING, 5-STAR MEALS, EXPENSES, ETC.
But The Media Allows the DisHonest Word Play.
NEVER CALLS HILLARY ON SUCH STATEMENTS.
MEDIA CORRUPTION IS ONE OF THE TOP ISSUES IN AMERICA TODAY.
VOTE TRUMP / GOP 2016 TO STOP LYING CORRUPT DEMOCRATS FROM SELLING OUT THE USA TO FOREIGN INTERESTS, BLM DOMESTIC TERRORISTS, SHARIA BLOOD MONEY MID EAST COUNTRIES RIFE WITH ANTI-WOMEN, ANTI-LGBT MID-EAST CRIMES AND THE HOLLYWOOD SLIMES.
